root: ^Ologun: Catfish, fried fish, smoked salmon for only N150! Come and get it. Fresh fish for only N150!
^Nolwazi: Excuse me Sir, did you say Catfish?
^Ologun: Ah Madame Officer, yes oooo, I make the best Catfish in Abuja. Catfish, stew and yam for only N150!
^Nolwazi: My grandmother used to make Catfish and stew when I visited her. May I have a plate.
^Ologun: Ah Madame of course. I will make it even nicer for you, your grandmother was a wise woman, catfish with stew and pounded yam, ah it will make you dance! *laughs*
^Nolwazi: *laughs* Thank you so much, it’s delicious.

^Ologun: Of course, nah. Let me tell you my secret ingredient. You see my friend Emmanuel owns a fruit stall, he sells me the best lemons, I just sprinkle a little over the fish, it makes all the difference. 150N for a pack of 25 lemons, 6N each.
^Nolwazi:One more thing I'll need. Do you perhaps know of an orphange nearby, this is Lekon, and he does not have a home. Will you take him?
^Ologun: Oh anything for the beautiful lady. Oya boy, come!
